name: Ekron
summary: A first-person myst-like exploration adventure. Awaken on a mysterious island that blends puzzles with an enigmatic narrative waiting to be unraveled. Explore an abandoned civilization and uncover a story that challenges the very fabric of time.

name: Ekholux
summary: Ekholux is a mind-bending VR experience where language collapses and motion speaks. Solve sound-based puzzles, break through walls, and race on gravity-defying rails. Created by VR visionary Hsin-Chien Huang, it’s full-body storytelling like never before.

name: Ekphrasis
summary: Ekphrasis is a 2D puzzle game where you can solve and examine a collection of artifacts. Piece together historical artworks, arrange musical notes, and decipher codes. Uncover the secrets behind the artifacts and those that curated them through a branching story.

name: Ekoman
summary: Ekoman is a story-driven action game with a stylized comic-book look: sense lies, track clues, drop enemies with melee combos; craft boosters in your lab, hurl and smash objects mid-fight, and unravel the city’s strangest conspiracy— even when bad luck won’t let go.

name: Eko Eko Azarak: Wizard of Darkness
summary: Eko Eko Azarak: Wizard of Darkness is a sound-novel-style adventure game based on the 1995 horror film of the same title, in turn adapted from the 1975 manga by Shinichi Koga, which tells an original story set in the same universe. High school student and witch Misa Kuroi has been trapped along with 12 other students in her school by a mysterious individual planning to summon the demon Lucifer into the human realm. The game is presented as a sound novel, consisting of long segments of text narration with digitized photo graphics; there are occasional choices for the player to make which can branch the story in various directions.

name: Ekans
summary: Experience the classic Snake game with a twist! You're the fruit, and your mission is to escape the snake. Outsmart your opponents, climb the leaderboard, and face the thrilling challenge!

name: Ekstase
summary: Amazing techno beats and beautiful visuals set the stage for a game that honors the long forgotten falling block puzzle genre. Ekstase is easy to pick up and sink many hours into. With both classic and new game modes, there is something here for both the casual and the hardcore puzzle game player.

name: Ekorella Vol 1
summary: A turn-based RPG set in a fantastic society of plants and animals. Fight against monsters and visit exotic places that have their unique culture and history. Beware of what lurks in the darkness...

name: Ekika Queen's Iand
summary: This is a horror-comedy youth violence novel game.

name: Eksperyment Delfin
summary:
In the year 2068, humanity managed to conquer the fourth dimension: time. Time travel becomes so widespread that a danger arises - someone may try not only to learn about the past, but also to alter history. Now it is the year 2098. The player takes on the role of special agent Dino Szmit and his job is to pursue such time-villains. The adventure begins as the player wakes up after a time travel accident...

Eksperyment Delfin (Experiment Dolphin) is a point and click adventure that allows the player to travel in time to counter a Nazi conspiracy plot. The game takes the player back to the year 1942 and beyond. It's based on traditional inventory puzzles, enhanced by the ability to jump not only to another location to find a needed item, but also to a different time. The few conversations the player will have feature dialog options.

name: Eko And The Bewitched Lands
summary: "Eko and the Bewitched Lands" is a roguelite action RPG game. Help Eko on his mission to save the bewitched lands filled with enemies. Acquire and upgrade weapons of all kinds to combat and discover all the secrets that awaits for you.

name: Ekudorado: Kagami no Naka no Oukoku
summary: Eroge RPG developed by Black Package in 1997.

name: Eklips
summary: Eklips is a minimalist puzzle game about making squares around a dot. Seems simple enough, but is it really?

name: Ekoh Beach
summary: Ekoh Beach is where you spent the best vacations of your childhood: golden sandy beaches, awesome arcades, zen tranquility and friendly faces. You have answered the call to return to Ekoh Beach once again and return its former glory with your building skills.
